channel.title: Toplist Account
channel.description:
Alright, I've got the following problem.
In the past a player set up the voting page for our server, now we'd like to redo it as we'd like to add new screenshots ect. The problem is, the player now pretends he wouldn't remember the password or any account details, is there anything we can do now?
Best regards, Ferity

item.title: Toplist Account
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

The point is, the main Owner, Deman, isn’t noted anywhere.
The noted Owner is a regular player who’s ignoring me atm, therefore I doubt he’ll give me any permission for the screenshot, but I’ve got the following.

Edit: The player now gave us access to the Toplist Account, therefore this is solved.
Thanks to all for the first replies and helpful Tips.

Read full topic

item.title: Toplist Account
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:4, topic:452531”]Well, I’m the forum Administrator and Head Staff, but it’s not a big thing to contact the Owner.
May I ask how I should prove that he is in fact the Owner?

Of course I could show a screenshot of the golden crown or the forum rank, but it’s not hard to fake those, therefore I doubt that that’ll be enough.

I now have also sent a PM to Moparisthebest and Tharok.[/quote]-show a screenshot saying that you have been given permission to administrate this change
-show a screenshot of you being logged in on the forum and you should be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Toplist Account
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Well, I’m the forum Administrator and Head Staff, but it’s not a big thing to contact the Owner.
May I ask how I should prove that he is in fact the Owner?

Of course I could show a screenshot of the golden crown or the forum rank, but it’s not hard to fake those, therefore I doubt that that’ll be enough.

I now have also sent a PM to Moparisthebest and Tharok.

Read full topic

item.title: Toplist Account
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

^ this 100%

but if you can prove that you are the direct owner of the server then you shouldn’t have any issues

Read full topic

item.title: Toplist Account
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you private message an administrator I’m sure they’d help.

Although, I believe only moparisthebest has access to those accounts so you’ll be waiting long enough for a reply.

Read full topic
